channel.title: array on PattySung
channel.description: Recent content in array on PattySung

item.title: Leetcode-153. Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
item.description: Suppose an array of length n sorted in ascending order is rotated between 1 and n times.

item.title: Leetcode-108. Convert Sorted Array to Binary Search Tree
item.description: Given an integer array nums where the elements are sorted in ascending order, convert it to a height-balanced binary search tree.

item.title: Leetcode-162. Find Peak Element
item.description: A peak element is an element that is strictly greater than its neighbors.

item.title: Leetcode-222. Count Complete Tree Nodes
item.description: Given the root of a complete binary tree, return the number of the nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-34. Find First and Last Position of Element in Sorted Array
item.description: Given an array of integers nums sorted in non-decreasing order, find the starting and ending position of a given target value.

item.title: Leetcode-35. Search Insert Position
item.description: Given a sorted array of distinct integers and a target value, return the index if the target is found.

item.title: Leetcode-74. Search a 2D Matrix
item.description: You are given an m x n integer matrix matrix with the following two properties:

item.title: Leetcode-238. Product of Array Except Self
item.description: Given an integer array nums, return an array answer such that answer[i] is equal to the product of all the elements of nums except nums[i].

item.title: Leetcode-821. Shortest Distance to a Character
item.description: Given a string s and a character c that occurs in s, return an array of integers answer where answer.

item.title: Leetcode-916. Word Subsets
item.description: You are given two string arrays words1 and words2. A string b is a subset of string a if every letter in b occurs in a including multiplicity.

item.title: Leetcode-48. Rotate Image
item.description: You are given an n x n 2D matrix representing an image, rotate the image by 90 degrees (clockwise).

item.title: Leetcode-136. Single Number
item.description: Given a non-empty array of integers nums, every element appears twice except for one.

item.title: Leetcode-268. Missing Number
item.description: Given an array nums containing n distinct numbers in the range [0, n], return the only number in the range that is missing from the array.

item.title: Leetcode-66. Plus One
item.description: You are given a large integer represented as an integer array digits, where each digits[i] is the ith digit of the integer.
